sections.content:
Question:
What kind of evaluation boards are prepared?
Answer:
RA Family is preparing three types of evaluation board in public following RA kit strategy. First one is EK-Board which aiming for seamlessly evaluation by supporting rich on-board features. Second one is Fast Prototyping board specialized for prototype development for a variety of applications. Last one is Solution kit for ASSP products.
For the RA2 Series,  we provide EK-board as EK-RA2L1, EK-RA2A1, EK-RA2E1,EK-RA2E2 and EK-RA2A2. Regards to FPB board, we provide  FPB-RA2E1, FPB-RA2E2 and FPB-RA2E3. Regards to Solution kit, we  provide Capacitive Touch Evaluation system for RA2L1.
Suitable Products
RA2L1, RA2A1, RA2E1, RA2E2, RA2E3, RA2A2
